Description: Day To Day (Calf) - The Mavericks listed Davis as Questionable on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Pistons.
Out For Season (Knee) - The Mavericks announced on Friday (Nov. 21) that Exum will undergo season-ending knee surgery.
Out (Knee) - The Mavericks said on Monday (Sept. 29) that Irving is ahead of schedule in his left ACL recovery but there's no timeline on his return yet.
Out For Season (Foot) - The Mavericks announced on Wednesday (Dec. 10) that Lively II will undergo season-ending foot surgery.
Day To Day (Illness) - The Mavericks listed Russell as Questionable on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Pistons.
Day To Day (Achilles) - The Mavericks listed Williams as Questionable on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Pistons.
